property.name: Flavor
property.value: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We called them 'armored lightning.'" - Gerrard of the *Weatherlight*

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Without Combat Medics, Icatia would probably not have withstood the forces of chaos as long as it did." - *Sarpadian Empires*, vol. VI

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That does it! I'm going back to hunting chickens!" - Rhirhok, goblin archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Icatian Javelineers enters the battlefield with a javelin counter on it. {T}, Remove a javelin counter from Icatian Javelineers: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The true dishonor for a soldier is surviving the war." - Telim'Tor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from black {W}: Order of the White Shield gains first strike until end of turn. {W}{W}: Order of the White Shield gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A shield of light admits no shadow.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury." - *Song of All*, canto 211

property.name: Rules
property.value: Buyback - Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.) Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Sacred Mesa unless you sacrifice a Pegasus. {1}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Pegasus creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do not go there, do not go / unless you rise on wings, unless you walk on hooves." - "Song to the Sun," Femeref song

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Healers ultimately acquire the divine gifts of spiritual and physical wholeness. The most devout are also granted the ability to pass physical wholeness on to others.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We are to be bound together as the reeds of a basket." - Asmira, Rashida, and Jabari, unity chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die." - Oracle *en*-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Cuombajj Witches deals 1 damage to any target and 1 damage to any target of an opponent's choice.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Could there be a fouler act? No doubt the baron knows of one." - Autumn Willow

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards at random.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Hypnotic Specter deals damage to an opponent, that player discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ihsan, the weak. Ihsan, the fallen. Ihsan, the betrayer. He has brought shame to the Serra Paladins where none existed before. May his suffering equal his betrayal." - Baris, Serra Inquisitor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Protection from white {B}: Knight of Stromgald gains first strike until end of turn. {B}{B}: Knight of Stromgald gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first. Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Goblin Balloon Brigade gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From up here we can drop rocks and arrows and more rocks!" "Uh, yeah boss, but how do we get down?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Digging Team: Destroy target Wall.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From down here we can make the whole wall collapse!" "Uh, yeah, boss, but how do we get out?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a Goblin. Goblin Grenade deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't suppose we could teach them to throw the cursed things?" - Ivra Jursdotter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you're a goblin, you don't have to step forward to be a hero - everyone else just has to step back!" - Biggum Flodrot, goblin veteran

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Goblins get +1/+1 and have mountainwalk.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be king, Numsgil did in Blog, who did in Unkful, who did in Viddle, who did in Loll, who did in Alrok . . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Goblin Mutant can't attack if defending player controls an untapped creature with power 3 or greater. Goblin Mutant can't block creatures with power 3 or greater.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards, reveal them, then shuffle and put those cards on top in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Snowman blocks, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by it this turn. {T}: Goblin Snowman deals 1 damage to target creature it's blocking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Strength in numbers? Right." - Ib Halfheart, goblin tactician

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}: Destroy target artifact. That artifact deals damage equal to its mana value to Goblin Tinkerer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Can they *do* that?" - Imwita, Zhalfirin artificer, last words

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Goblin Vandal attacks and isn't blocked, you may pay {R}. If you do, destroy target artifact defending player controls and Goblin Vandal assigns no combat damage this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Create three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." - *Sarpadian Empires*, vol. IV

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice Mogg Fanatic: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I got it! I got it! I - "

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mogg Flunkies can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They'll attack whatever's in front of them - as long as you tell them where that is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a Goblin: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The evisceration of one mogg always cheers up the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may exile a red card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Pyrokinesis deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pyrotechnics deals 4 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hi! ni! ya! Behold the man of flint, that's me! / Four lightnings zigzag from me, strike and return." - Navajo war chant

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Charging alone takes uncommong daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oi oi oi, me gotta hurt in 'ere, Oi oi oi, me smell a ting is near, Gonna bosh 'n gonna nosh 'n da hurt'll disappear." - Troll chant

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We know our place in the cycle of life - and it is not as flies." - Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It had a mouth like that of a great beast, and gnashed its teeth as it strained to reach us. I am thankful it possessed no means of locomotion." - Vervamon the Elder

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-Wall creature an opponent controls gains forestwalk until your next upkeep. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While it possesses potent venom, the giant spider often chooses not to paralyze its victims. Perhaps the creature enjoys the gentle rocking motion caused by its captives' struggles to escape its web.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Oh, no - not *you* again?!" - Jaya Ballard, task mage

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The raging winds . . . , settling on the sea, the surges sweep, / Raise liquid mountains, and disclose the deep." - Virgil, *Aeneid*, Book I, trans. Dryden

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One bone broken for every twig snapped underfoot. - Llanowar penalty for trespassing

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike, forestwalk, vigilance (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, it can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest, and attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +3/+3 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You want to know your enemy? Look at your feet while you trample him." - Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: String, weapons, wax, or jewels - it makes no difference. Leave nothing unguarded in Scarwood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Spectral Bears attacks, if defending player controls no black nontoken permanents, it doesn't untap during your next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I hear there are Bears - or spirits - that guard caravans passing through the forest." - Gulsen, abbey matron

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Woolly Spider blocks a creature with flying, Woolly Spider gets +0/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We need not fear the forces of the air; I've yet to see a Spider without an appetite." - Taaveti of Kelsinko, elvish hunter

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I do not remember what he said to her. I remember her fiery eyes, fixed upon him for an instant. I remember a flash, and the hot breath of sudden flames made me turn away. When I looked again, Angus was gone." - A wayfarer, on meeting Lady Orca

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The path of least resistance will seldom lead you beyond your doorstep." - Oracle *en*-Vec

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A fine example of the rewards of artifice: a thoroughly obedient steed with wings of Soldevi steel." - Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This timeworn relic was responsible for many of Urza's victories, though he never fully comprehended its mystic runes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nevinyrral's Disk enters the battlefield tapped. {1}, {T}: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and enchantments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Serrated Arrows enters the battlefield with three arrowhead counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are no arrowhead counters on Serrated Arrows, sacrifice it. {T}, Remove an arrowhead counter from Serrated Arrows: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {W}. Brushland deals 1 damage to you.

property.value: {T}: Add {G}. {T}: Target 1/1 creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.

property.value: Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {B}. Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.
